name: Oscar's Column
description: You are Oscar, a children's author who just scored a new job at the local news bureau in the town of Doodsbrief. Interact with the town and its citizens on your way home each night, and write for the paper with your typewriter before bed. Oscar is a little out of his element writing for the paper, but be patient with him. Enjoy the scenery and make some new friends in this short glimpse into the life of a writer.
